Stitch Developers

Welcome!

Welcome to the Stitch Developer Portal! Whether youâ€™re building on top of Stitch for your own use or integrating Stitch features into your service, you can find everything you need to get started right here.

Need some help? Check out the Stitch Community for guidance and to see what others are working on.

  • ALL PLANS
    Import API

    Push data from an arbitrary data source to Stitch.

    • Quick start
    • Authentication
    • API reference
    • Libraries and resources
    • All Import API guides
  • ENTERPRISE
    Post-load webhooks

    Stay informed with post-load webhooks, which fire each time data is loaded into your destination. This is a Stitch Enterprise feature.

    • Post-load webhooks guide
    • Setting up post-load webhooks
    • Webhook triggers
    • Data model reference
  • ENTERPRISE
    Connect API

    Programmatically manage your Stitch account or integrate Stitch with other applications with our REST API. This is a Stitch Enterprise feature.

    • Authentication
    • API reference
    • All Connect guides
  • ENTERPRISE
    Connect.js

    In conjunction with the Connect API, send users to Stitch to complete data source configuration workflows with this JavaScript library. This is a Stitch Enterprise feature.

    • Installation
    • JavaScript reference
